name: Q-Dungeon
description:
Dodge traps! Collect Coins! Beat Highscores!

Q-Dungeon is an endless runner for mobile devices, where you must avoid traps whilst collecting coins and chests

Features:

  • Selectable upgradeable characters
  • Integrated leaderboards (compete against your friends)
  • Google Play achivements
  • Dynamic Weather

Privacy Policy: https://pages.flycricket.io/qdungeon/privacy.html
